title: Recollections of a Visit to Glasgow with the British Archæological Associations, August 27th to September 5th, 1888. With notes
author: Lambert, George
snippet: Mr.Scott pointed out the earthen walls round the camp andstated that there wap a similar one at Carmunnock, anotherone at Pollok, a third at Crookston, and a fourth at Oakshaw-
